methods.name: getSignText
methods.desc: Gets all the lines of text on a sign.
returns: The lines of text on a sign.
args: The world the sign is in.

methods.name: getChestContents
methods.desc: Gets all the items in a chest.
args: The world the chest is in.

methods.name: setSignText
methods.desc: Sets all the lines of text on a sign.
args: The world the sign is in.
4 lines of text for the sign.

methods.name: setSignTextLine
methods.desc: Sets a single line of text on a sign.
args: The world the sign is in.
The line of text to set.

methods.name: setChestSlot
methods.desc: Sets the specified quanity of the item id by placing it in the specified slot.
returns: True if the item was given. False will be returned if the chest is not on the server.
args: The world the chest is in.

methods.name: setChestSlotWithData
methods.desc: Sets the specified quanity of the item id with the specified data by placing it in the specified slot.
returns: True if the item was set. False will be returned if the chest is not on the server. An exception could be thrown for invalid data (data < 0 or data > 15).
args: The world the chest is in.
Decimal representation of the data value.

methods.name: spawn
methods.desc: Spawn an entity at the given location in the give world.
returns: True if the entity was successfully spawned. False otherwise.
args: The world to spawn the entity into.
The name of the mob/entity to spawn. Comes from this list (case-sensitive): http://jd.bukkit.org/apidocs/org/bukkit/entity/EntityType.html#enum_constant_summary
